author: Animalogic
description:
Therizinosaurus has had one of the biggest, if not THE BIGGEST, glow up of any dinosaur ever. From humble beginnings as a strange sea turtle, to a massive feathered vegetarian theropod. It's a weird dino, but most of what we know comes from a set a claws and discoveries of its closest relatives. So who really was therizinosaurus?

00:00 We Were So Wrong about Therizinosaurus
01:21 The Turtle Misinterpretation
03:29 The Turtle Era Fades
05:20 The Segnosauridae Connection
06:31 From Turtle to Theropod
07:19 Pop Culture Rise
08:50 Therizinosaurus in Video Games
09:50 Scientific Discoveries
11:03 Changing Perception
12:09 Paleo Fantasy Phase
13:47 Modern Feathered Look
16:32 Jurassic World Dominion (2022)
17:41 Prehistoric Planet (2022)

title: We Were So Wrong about Therizinosaurus
